name: outputdirectedtheoremproving
description: Ai Agent that helps with output directed theorem proving in Coq.

chatParticipants.name: Coq Prover AI
chatParticipants.description: An AI agent to assist with output-directed theorem proving and tactic generation in Coq files.
welcomeMessage: I'm your Coq Proving Assistant. I can help you generate proofs, simplify goals, or explain complex theorems based on your current Coq context.
Try asking: **'Suggest the next tactic for this goal'**

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
